summary: A add-on for Paradise halls - skyrim slavery, it adds a merchant at the back of the bannered mare called bill the shady and he is pretty hard to miss as he is the only guy behind there (unless you have another mod.
descriptionHtml:
So the big one happened, this mod now adds 15 new merchants in total to the world of skyrim who all sell whips, collars and other things.

What my mod does:

This mod adds to paradise halls by adding merchants that can sell you the whips and slave collar that you had to craft in the previous versions, now you can buy them for a suitable price from a merchant, you may now also sell stolen goods to said merchants.

Version 0.4

this is updated to work with PAH 0.7 it is just a small fix right now but i am of course going to be bringing back everything else, right now bill the shady is the only one there so until i re-add all other characters you can just ignore the rest of the pictures.

old since 0.3

the list of merchants is now this:

Bill the shady - backside of the bannered mare - whiterun

jill the undercutter - basement of the winking skeever in, - solitude

malard the rocktooth - in front of museum - markarth

friskus the rude - grey quarters - windhelm

wombat the hidden - ragged flagon - riften

freddy the freak - by the ship - dawnstar

holly the hog - second gate - falkreath

jebb runnynose - inside the inn - morthal

hubb the chubby - basement inn - winterhold

tyson earbit - baracks - dragon bridge

marsha magpie - back of the smithy - ivarstead

henrietta hen - smelter - karthwasten

bush the bought - by campfire - riverwood

Nancy the fancy - by the farm - rorikstead

chris blueye - back of house - shor\'s stone

I am playing with the thought of adding zaz whips and chains to this mod but i am also considering making a separate merchant mod for that so no promises.

Also if any of you have any thought, ideas or suggestions please dont be afraid i dont bite :)

This mod should not crash with any other mods but if it does please tell me and i will try to fix it, i am very new to modding and this is the first attempt to anything serious.

of course you also need Paradise halls located slightly below this in the description.

I hope you enjoy it and dont forget to check out paradise halls (if you havent) and also check the other great addons for it here\'s some links:

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29886]Paradise Halls[/url] By Layam

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31160]Animated prostitution patch for  paradise halls[/url] By Mutifex

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31307]Paradise Halls Extender Slave spell and poison[/url] Also by Mutifex

List of future updates:

0.4 TBA

List of current and old Versions:

0.3: added 10 Merchants to minor cities and villages, merchants now buy stolen goods, didn\'t change the names of the merchants and kept the old ones, made the merchants sell more whips and collars, they now sell 5 whips instead of 3 and 20 collars instead of 10.

0.2: Added four merchants to all the major cities i.e. solitude, markarth, windhelm, riften on top of keeping the original one in whiterun.

0.1: Added a merchant: Bill the shady to whiterun behind the banered mare.

Enjoy :)
author: lucen15
